eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Shape
      • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape
    Class Circle provides methods to draw a circle at a given location with a given radius.
